name: DailyMotivationandInspiration
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Daily inspiration provides people with the motivational topics or self improvement topics that one needs to hear to start their day off with a positive attitude because nothing in life is more meaningful when you have a positive attitude about something. If you go into work every day with a negative attitude you are guaranteed to have a terrible day, day after day. Start the day off right with a positive attitude whether it will be at work, or at home are you are going to have a more meaningful life! People need positive reinforcement. People need to hear positive things especially in the society we live in today. Listen to my voice and relax and take in every word I'm saying and listen to it, hear it and most importantly, believe it. It will make you a better and more calm person.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
